import React from 'react' import Logo from '../images/nft.png' import { useState } from 'react'; import CreateNFTComponent from './Create'; function Navbar() { const [showCreateNFT, setShowCreateNFT] = useState(false); const handleCreateNFTClick = () => { setShowCreateNFT(true); // Optionally, you can scroll to the Create NFT component using window.scrollTo or a library like react-scroll }; return (
